amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce overall spending in the bill by $5.75 billion to reflect FY2008 spending levels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in part B of House Report 111-184 to reduce overall spending in the bill by $5.75 billion to reflect FY2008 spending levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jordan (OH) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 259 (Roll no. 468).
